title: Storck x PodBike Frikar affordable enclosed e-bike velomobile to replace your car
content:
E-bikes are trying to find their way into our hearts on & off-road, but this new 4-wheeled, fully-enclosed Storck x PodBike Frikar e-velomobile just might be a viable solution for some looking to cut back on driving cars. It’s not really an e-bike – this recumbent has four wheels, after all. But it’s at least

The post Storck x PodBike Frikar affordable enclosed e-bike velomobile to replace your car appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
